last_episode_to_air.name: Pinwheel
last_episode_to_air.overview: What is this ring of spies set up in Africa? Melanie knows, or thinks she knows, or anyway means to find out, why not?

name: I Spy
overview:
I Spy is an American television secret-agent adventure series. It ran for three seasons on NBC from 1965 to 1968 and teamed Robert Culp as international tennis player Kelly Robinson with Bill Cosby as his trainer, Alexander Scott. The characters' travels as ostensible "tennis bums", Robinson playing talented tennis as an amateur with the wealthy in return for food and lodging, and Scott tagging along, provided a cover story concealing their roles as top agents for the Pentagon. Their real work usually kept them busy chasing villains, spies, and beautiful women.

The creative forces behind the show were writers David Friedkin and Morton Fine and cinematographer Fouad Said. Together they formed Three F Productions under the aegis of Desilu Studios where the show was produced. Fine and Friedkin were co-producers and head writers, and wrote the scripts for 16 episodes, one of which Friedkin directed. Friedkin also dabbled in acting and appeared in two episodes in the first season.

Actor-producer Sheldon Leonard, best known for playing gangster roles in the 1940s and '50s, was the executive producer. He also played a gangster-villain role in two episodes and appeared in a third show as himself in a humorous cameo. In addition, he directed one episode and served as occasional second-unit director throughout the series.

episodes.name: So Long, Patrick Henry
episodes.overview: A defector in old Hong Kong claims the attention of Robinson & Scott.

episodes.name: A Cup of Kindness
episodes.overview: One of their own has joined the adverse party, so Scott & Robinson are sent to Hong Kong after him.

episodes.name: Carry Me Back to Old Tsing-Tao
episodes.overview: A businessman in Hong Kong owes the IRS; Robinson & Scott carry the loot.

episodes.name: Chrysanthemum
episodes.overview: A French spy hampers the search for missing files.

episodes.name: Dragon's Teeth
episodes.overview: A murder happens in front of them, and Robinson & Scott must investigate a mysterious organization.

episodes.name: The Loser
episodes.overview: A nightclub singer is a pawn between drug smugglers (who have kidnapped Scott) and the pair.

episodes.name: Danny Was a Million Laughs
episodes.overview: A bodyguard assignment for a very unpleasant sort of fellow.

episodes.name: The Time of the Knife
episodes.overview: An agent is killed, the microfilm is missing, his girlfriend is threatened.

episodes.name: No Exchange on Damaged Merchandise
episodes.overview: A prisoner exchange requires a search for a double agent.

episodes.name: Tatia
episodes.overview: Vietnam has not seen three agents assigned there, and Scott suspects Robinson's girlfriend.

episodes.name: Weight of the World
episodes.overview: A Tokyo seminar on obesity is threatened with a new form of Chinese plague.

episodes.name: Three Hours on a Sunday Night
episodes.overview: Missing microfilm must be paid for or Scott will be killed, but where to get the shekels?

episodes.name: Tigers of Heaven
episodes.overview: An anti-American group in Japan menaces the last of the aristocracy.

episodes.name: Affair in T'Sien Cha
episodes.overview: An American schoolteacher, an ancient walled city, a missing train and a valuable cargo lost in China.

episodes.name: The Tiger
episodes.overview: A definitive mission to Vietnam in order to rescue the daughter of a physician.

episodes.name: The Barter
episodes.overview: Russian defector for American girl: good business or not?

episodes.name: Always Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: A womanizing American hampers efforts to protect a Japanese economic conference from Communist sabotage.

episodes.name: Court of the Lion
episodes.overview: A Zulu (Oxon.) who trades diamonds for revenge, a gangster dominating a small village, and radioactive isotopes.

episodes.name: Turkish Delight
episodes.overview: Who is kidnapping the great agronomists in Mexico City?

episodes.name: Bet Me a Dollar
episodes.overview: They bet each other a dollar that one can evade the other for a week, but he's been contaminated with anthrax and must be found in 24 hours.

episodes.name: Return to Glory
episodes.overview: An exiled South American dictator has plans, or has he, really?

episodes.name: The Conquest of Maude Murdock
episodes.overview: A redoubtable Embassy figure in Mexico deals them a turn.

episodes.name: A Day Called 4 Jaguar
episodes.overview: Quetzalcoatl has appeared in the Mexican jungle, or is it an AWOL cosmonaut pursued by his old comrades?

episodes.name: Crusade to Limbo
episodes.overview: Infiltrate a revolutionary South American group, with Hollywood connections, that's the assignment.

episodes.name: My Mother, the Spy
episodes.overview: An agent abroad and pregnant with information must report to the boys back home after her affair with the adverse party.

episodes.name: There Was a Little Girl
episodes.overview: Bodyguard work for a VIP's daughter. She buys an objet d'art, and hell ensues.

episodes.name: It's All Done with Mirrors
episodes.overview: Robinson is brainwashed to kill Scott, whose orders are to kill Robinson.

episodes.name: One Thousand Fine
episodes.overview: Gold fever among old friends in the jungles of Mexico.

episodes.name: So Coldly Sweet
episodes.overview: The phonybaloney defector is a real target when the game turns serious.

episodes.name: Lori
episodes.overview: Six demolitions experts down, one to go, and his sister the only lead.

episodes.name: Sophia
episodes.overview: Scott's foster daughter in Rome is about to be married, and he's in a great deal of trouble.

episodes.name: Vendetta
episodes.overview: A family court settles an old Italian grudge.

episodes.name: A Gift from Alexander
episodes.overview: A literary masterpiece is out of the Soviet Union, will our boys kindly retrieve it?

episodes.name: Trial by Treehouse
episodes.overview: Smuggler plans citywide blackout.

episodes.name: Sparrowhawk
episodes.overview: Las Vegas on vacation with a king as bodyguards, and an assassin's menace.

episodes.name: Will the Real Good Guys Please Stand Up?
episodes.overview: Desperate measures to kidnap a scientist: faux Scotty and Kelly!

episodes.name: Bridge of Spies
episodes.overview: In a tour of Venice, the old orthodontist gives Robinson a guide with a watch, a special watch, the kind that bugs spies.

episodes.name: One of Our Bombs Is Missing
episodes.overview: A very delicate dilemma, an atom bomb lost in a plane crash near an Italian village.

episodes.name: To Florence, with Love (1)
episodes.overview: Squiring a Leonardo to Florence.

episodes.name: To Florence, with Love (2)
episodes.overview: Now, to replace the faux Leonardo in the museum with the real one in our hands.

episodes.name: Lisa
episodes.overview: A Grecian mail order bride may be a Trojan horse.

episodes.name: Little Boy Lost
episodes.overview: Lonely little tyke borrows a guidance system to attract his father's attention. The adverse party is interested.

episodes.name: Father Abraham
episodes.overview: Young agent is bait in trap set for KGB, but his father is not in on the setup.

episodes.name: Rome ... Take Away Three
episodes.overview: Blackmail and murder at the U.S. Embassy.

episodes.name: Tonia
episodes.overview: A most prickly diversion. Scott has fallen in love with a radical expatriate, Robinson disapproves, Scott resigns. Her cell leader welcomes discord; she is murdered, Robinson is blamed.

episodes.name: Child Out of Time
episodes.overview: Little girl gifted with memory holds the Nazi past in her keeping.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Temple
episodes.overview: The trouble with Temple is her boyfriend is evil.

episodes.name: The War Lord
episodes.overview: Photojournalism brings in money, but the photojournalist is held captive.

episodes.name: A Room with a Rack
episodes.overview: Torture pure and simple has Robinson down in the dumps, with his career in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Mainly on the Plains
episodes.overview: Don Quixote is the fascination of a professor with vital plans and an errant mind.

episodes.name: Get Thee to a Nunnery
episodes.overview: Yanks vs. Brits after Nazi art treasures in a convent garden.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: Flashback on a murdered ballerina, Soviet style?

episodes.name: Magic Mirror
episodes.overview: Difficult situation, lover tied to exiled strongman dealing in opposing missiles.

episodes.name: Night Train to Madrid
episodes.overview: USO tour interrupted by adverse machinations toward angry comedian.

episodes.name: Casanova from Canarsie
episodes.overview: Mata Hari vs. file clerk.

episodes.name: Cops and Robbers
episodes.overview: Old home week with the adverse party next door.

episodes.name: Let's Kill Karlovassi
episodes.overview: Assassinating a double agent on the beach in the Aegean just doesn't sound like fun.

episodes.name: The Beautiful Children
episodes.overview: Deep cover agent is blown, won't leave sideline.

episodes.name: Laya
episodes.overview: A very small person on the Embassy staff becomes a very large factor in espionage plans.

episodes.name: The Medarra Block
episodes.overview: A mysterious stone cube holds the key to rebellion against the Moroccan government.

episodes.name: Philotimo
episodes.overview: The best you can say about a child prodigy who takes you for a ride is maybe he's defective, after all.

episodes.name: The Honorable Assassins
episodes.overview: To Marrakesh with an old man's cash and his daughter and some bandits after the old man.

episodes.name: Now You See Her, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Betrayal and deduction on the trail of an absconded mathematician last seen on the isle of Mykonos.

episodes.name: Red Sash of Courage
episodes.overview: On the border between Greece and Yugoslavia, airplane trouble besets USAF flights. Worse than that, who has been sleeping with the mayor's daughter?

episodes.name: The Seventh Captain
episodes.overview: Anti-submarine warfare and mysterious assassinations.

episodes.name: Apollo
episodes.overview: Undercover counterspying at NASA with an ex-wife as beard, who disappears.

episodes.name: Oedipus at Colonus
episodes.overview: A holy leader of men dies apparently on the eve of religious fighting in Morocco.

episodes.name: The Lotos Eater
episodes.overview: Robinson takes a powder and calls it quits in the Greek archipelago.

episodes.name: An American Empress
episodes.overview: San Francisco, the Empress of China, fireworks, the Reds.

episodes.name: Home to Judgement
episodes.overview: Pursued all the way down on the farm, Robinson & Scott fend off attackers.

episodes.name: Anyplace I Hang Myself Is Home
episodes.overview: Bouts of depression hit Scott too hard for anything but counseling. He and Robinson independently remember training school.

episodes.name: Tag, You're It
episodes.overview: Hare & hounds in San Francisco with the cadets, a charming tourist and a ringer.

episodes.name: A Few Miles West of Nowhere
episodes.overview: A nuclear power station is planned for the desert, but an operative is dead on the scene. The town is tight and runs the boys out, but they keep plugging.

episodes.name: This Guy Smith
episodes.overview: Vacationing at a mountain retreat, they strike at an adverse communications officer, who strikes back with a frame.

episodes.name: Turnabout for Traitors
episodes.overview: Setup as a sellout, down and out in Acapulco. The adverse party has its front men not to be recognized from your own.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday... Everybody
episodes.overview: Protecting the retired agent and family against the deranged and vengeful gotten loose on the streets.

episodes.name: Shana
episodes.overview: She has a bit of top secret propellant, the Communists have her brother.

episodes.name: The Name of the Game
episodes.overview: Why, says the ex-general, don't they let us fight? He will have game, let it be us, or Robinson & Scott.

episodes.name: Suitable for Framing
episodes.overview: Faux Senator is arranged to assassinate a President.

episodes.name: The Spy Business
episodes.overview: Army Intelligence is receiving hits on its defector, who is leaving clues to his whereabouts, Robinson's old buddy, the other S2 debriefer?

episodes.name: Carmelita Is One of Us
episodes.overview: The baby has now a microdot left by her father, and the assassins won't stop there.

episodes.name: Pinwheel
episodes.overview: What is this ring of spies set up in Africa? Melanie knows, or thinks she knows, or anyway means to find out, why not?
